creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: printed blue floral collar; yoke embroidered with running chain stitch, edging, commercial braid and scroll design in pink, white, green; front overlap fastens under right arm with frog; sleeves are five bands alternating between embroidery and printed fabric in pink, purple, green, rust; main body is black corduroy
title: Jacket
